function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased energy consumption in unoccupied public buildings during lockdown","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in controlling the consumption of natural resources in epidemic-resilient homes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in household energy consumption due to extended periods of lockdown","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient energy consumption in unoccupied buildings during lockdown","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper
